mapper.insert: insert into order_pay (order_pay_id, order_id, need_amount, pay_amount, pay_date, cashier_employee_code, cashier_employee_name, pay_source, position_id, order_return_id, order_pay_type, pay_return, daogou_position_id, daogou_employee_code, daogou_employee_name, order_pay_remark ) values (#{order_pay_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{order_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{need_amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pay_amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pay_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cashier_employee_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cashier_employee_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pay_source,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{position_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{order_return_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{order_pay_type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pay_return,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{daogou_position_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{daogou_employee_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{daogou_employee_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{order_pay_remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update order_pay set order_id = #{order_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, need_amount = #{need_amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pay_amount = #{pay_amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pay_date = #{pay_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cashier_employee_code = #{cashier_employee_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cashier_employee_name = #{cashier_employee_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_source = #{pay_source,jdbcType=INTEGER}, position_id = #{position_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_return_id = #{order_return_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_pay_type = #{order_pay_type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_return = #{pay_return,jdbcType=INTEGER}, daogou_position_id = #{daogou_position_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, daogou_employee_code = #{daogou_employee_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, daogou_employee_name = #{daogou_employee_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_pay_remark = #{order_pay_remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where order_pay_id = #{order_pay_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select order_pay_id, order_id, need_amount, pay_amount, pay_date, cashier_employee_code, cashier_employee_name, pay_source, position_id, order_return_id, order_pay_type, pay_return, daogou_position_id, daogou_employee_code, daogou_employee_name, order_pay_remark from order_pay where order_pay_id = #{order_pay_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
